name: KLC
description: '''Craig Stephen Lawson''' (born July 15, 1969), known professionally as '''KLC''', is an American [[record producer]], [[DJ]] and [[drummer]]. He found fame as a member of [[No Limit Records]]' in-house production team [[Beats by the Pound]]. Since leaving the label, he has been a member of the [[The Medicine Men|Medicine Men]] and has his own record label Overdose Entertainment aka Overdose Empire.
